channel.title: How do I edit this?
channel.description:
Hello I was wondering on how to edit this, in the shop it says its 50k. But when you click on it, it says its 350m I was wondering on how to change the price in the shop for it to say 350m instead of 50k same with everything in that shop really. everything in that shops prices are different once you click it so I want it to all look the same if someone could tell me what files I need edit that would be great.
[img]http://gyazo.com/4de0f759cd39c8d2d8e865c6b7dc41e9.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/9285dd6002d526eee8e45bdd5bf26325.png[/img]

item.description:
@rraayy wrote:

I got the same problem there! Let me know if you fixt it, because i searched a while.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I edit this?
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

I think the price’s on those items are the alch price’s try and alch one of those and see if they are corresponding to the gp it shows not the gp it costs of so just change the alch price and i think it should fix itself.

Read full topic
